website_summaries.verdict: This pack of 120 basic kitchen trash bags is a notable value; a low price point for a quality product.
pros: Bags are slightly over-sized to easily fit most trash can sizes and shapes
Strong and sturdy bags can hold up to 13 gallons of trash and come in a pack of 120
Drawstring closure makes it easy to tie up and take trash out
cons: These bags don’t stretch as much as competing brand bags

customer_reviews.title: Solid bags.
customer_reviews.text: I could tell no difference between these and their brand-named counterpart except they're around $2.30 less for 120 bags and the .mil rating for these are .9. Some name brands were only .78 .mil Just an FYI...regardless what they call the bag, or its super duper strength, the one and only aspect which matters is the .mil number. The higher the .mil number, the better the bag.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Update: March 2020. I've been using these as my regular kitchen trash can bags and have absolutely no reason to switch. As long as these are available for a better price than Target, I'll buy these. They do exactly what I need them too. Hold tight to the can, don't rip under duress, red ties hold tight and don't become disconnected. Will buy again as needed.
customer_reviews.author: So Cal Dad

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely no grip, won't fit a standard 13 gallon trash can
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have indicated, these bags don't grip the edge of the trash can and will, without fail, fall into the trash can when filled even a small amount, rendering them completely useless. Don't waste your money here.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & cheap price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent trash bags. Great packaging so its easy to dispense bags from the box (genius). The thickness is in between "heavy duty" and "thin" discount store trash bags. Thus, medium thickness... They are perfect. Some people said they were too thin, that's not true. Glad I bought them anyway whoop! See photos.
customer_reviews.author: OC88

customer_reviews.title: Easily ripped
customer_reviews.text: These bags do not hold up well to normal use. I've had 2 tear when taking them out of the trash in the kitchen. I don't consider my use of them heavy or rough. I'll go back to the bags I used to to use.
customer_reviews.author: Orion940

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good value
customer_reviews.text: Good price and hold up well. Use these generally for dumping out clay litter and so I can attest to them being strong. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: L1

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality bags
customer_reviews.text: When I first seen the bags I was worried because they looked like the dollar store ones that I do not like but they are Not!! they are very high quality and they are a little oversized to fit over the edges,
customer_reviews.author: cavanagh

customer_reviews.title: they seemed to be strangely coated in something faintly scented
customer_reviews.text: i was actually really allergic to these. they seemed to have some kind of scent clinging to them. maybe not added, but environmental from being made in a factory with other scented products, or from being stored near them? i dont know. they made my skin red and itchy and i got pretty bad asthma and a weird smell rubbed off on everything they rubbed against. they probably worked fine as garbage bags but i couldnt use them, they made me too sick.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: These bags are imbued with hideous FRAGRANCE
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, I had to shout in my headline because nowhere on the box or in the listing is it mentioned that these bags have been permeated with synthetic fragrance. If you have asthma, chemical sensitivities, are pregnant, or have allergies you don't want these in your house! In fact no one should be having synthetically fragranced anything in their home or on their person because these substances are neurotoxins (damaging to the cells of your brain,) endocrine disruptors (mess up your hormonal balance,) and carcinogens (cause cancer)!!! Plus, they smell gross. When my garbage stinks, that's the cue to take it out, not bathe it in chemical soup.
customer_reviews.author: r

customer_reviews.title: Tie broke, these are no good
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I will buy these again. I was taking the trash out and the tie broke and I had to clean up trash. I don't remember any other bags breaking like that.
customer_reviews.author: mo

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: The bags themselves are bad but 2 out of the 4 rolls had these slashes in them making them totally useless. This looks to be something on the manufacturing because every single bag in the roll had the exact cut pattern in it. Be careful buying because you could end up with a bunch unuseable bags.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith C Mumpower

customer_reviews.title: Garbage bags are garbage DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: 13gal tall kitchen bags (grip the can bags) Doesn’t grip anything. Bags are cheap and rip easily no stretching. Supposedly thicker than Glad forceflex but rips like tissue paper. Spend the extra $2 get the name brand, these are not worth the plastic used to make them. First “amazon” brand that I’ve purchased I will never use again. Shame on amazon for putting such cheap garbage up and promoting it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Expect to need to double or triple bag your trash.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for with these trash bags. They are very cheap and flimsy. We find that we often have to double or triple bag our trash because the bag has ripped when our can isn't even half full. They are nothing like the generic store brand bags that we usually buy. The next time we purchase trash bag we will pay the extra $0.01 cent a bag for the Non-Amazon brand bags. These are a gross waste of money and plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work fine
customer_reviews.text: These are good bags if you're going through a lot or don't have to move your garbage far. However, they tear pretty easily, so don't overstuff them or be careful about putting things with sharp edges inside. I used them for moving when I was filling a lot of bags. The price really can't be beat if you need a lot of bags.
customer_reviews.author: MadDownpour

customer_reviews.title: Good product - decently priced
customer_reviews.text: I would say good product, though not rip free - so do not fill a lot, good for daily kitchen use. Cannot hold cardboards or thick boxes which will rip through. I like that it is soft enough to quickly pick from roll and fix in the trash can. It has tie to close once you are ready to throw in garbage can. It is decently priced for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Too thin, rips, repeatedly need to use 2 bags to get the trash out
customer_reviews.text: 1st time user, after having used Kirkland Brand and then Boxed, both of which were better quality. From the very first bag to now the 4th bag, I have had to double-bag to take the trash out. Each time (yes, all FOUR times!), the minute I pull the bag out of the trash container, I find 1 or 2 rips in it. Both other bags NEVER (repeat NEVER!) had this issue!!! I will never buy this again. That said, these bags came with a satisfaction guarantee and Amazon's Customer Service line made it quick and easy to get my subscription cancelled and my purchase refunded. 5 stars for their Customer Service, but ZERO stars for this bag! :(
customer_reviews.author: M W

customer_reviews.title: Bag Width Is Too Small for Our New Undercounter Kitchen Trash Containers.
customer_reviews.text: The actual measurements of the bag do NOT conform to the previously described size. Since my purchase, the size describes the box rather than the bag itself. Thus in order to attempt to install the bag, one either cuts the bag or punches a hole in the top of the bag in an attempt to stretch it over the trash can lip. Rather than repeat other reviews, I agree with all of the reviewers who rated this product a ONE star. I am very disappointed in Amazon attaching it's name to this inferior product. Apparently Amazon's quality control staff needs to be more consumer oriented.
customer_reviews.author: DrNaples

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes you just do not want to go out and buy trash bags lol I purchased these because they were affordable and they turned out PERFECT for my kitchen trash can! if you have a smaller trash can for your kitchen than i would highly recommend these! Best points i would say would have to be: Cheap Tie works well gives a little bit of an extra room at the bottom not too small for my needs, but not too big that it falls into my trash can. I honestly do not have anything bad to say about these bags!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sargent Dude

customer_reviews.title: Good value, similar to hefty/glad drawstring bags
customer_reviews.text: We are "bang for the buck" people, and found this to meet our criteria. The 200 count we got came with 4 large roles in 1 square box, which is worth noting. This is opposed to having them pull out from a box...but in fairness, I don't know how else you'd package 200 of these at a time. We will continue to purchase if price remains competitive.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Wallace

customer_reviews.title: received defective batch?
customer_reviews.text: All of my bags have a spot near the top when you go to open the bag, its fused together and you have to rip them apart to get them unstuck to each other, which leaves 2 rips about 2 inches in length in the bag
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy, but okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: We used these bags in a regular 13 gallon kitchen trash can and, for the most part, didn't overfill. But every time we would take it out, it would rip. We got to the point where we were having to drag the entire trash can out to the big can for pickup just to avoid it. Last time, we spent 45 minutes picking up and sweeping garbage from the driveway where it busted. If you are looking at these for the price and you have pretty light trash/take half-empty bags to the curb, these are for you. If you have a big family or don't change bags quite as often, skip these.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good product
customer_reviews.text: We normally use Glad bags with the elastic at the top. These don't have elastic at the top & don't stay on the can very well but other than that, no complaints. They don't rip when you pull them out of the can & we haven't had issues with ripping or tearing. I bought A HUGE box of them but I'll probably go back to the ones with the grip top after these are gone. I hate digging the bag out of the garbage can when it falls inside & as a wife & mother to 3 boys you know I am the only one who can see when this happens (insert eye roll here). Decent bag tho.
customer_reviews.author: texascutie

customer_reviews.title: Not stretchy type
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed this is not the stretchy type material but they seem to be of ok quality. I double up on them to go down the trash chute in case, which, doesn’t make them a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these 13-gallon bags before and was happy with them. They arrived in a blue and white box, easy access and I thought this purchase would be the same. NO! They arrived in a cardboard box which I opened to find bags thrown in at random. After going through several layers of bags I did find a roll or two just at the bottom of the big box. No boxed individual bags! I was very disappointed and questioned how clean or sanitized these bags could be. The last thing you want during this time of Coronavirus is a package like this. No, I do not want to purchase again and would not recommend a purchase like this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Q

customer_reviews.title: Save a step. Dump the garbage directly on to your floor.
customer_reviews.text: There's a pandemic. My husband just left me and our two toddlers. I just got diagnosed with a brain tumor and THESE BAGS. These bags are what gives me a headache. If there is more than five pounds of stuff in them, the entire tie that you're supposed to carry the bag with rips away from the bag. If there's anything even relatively rough or hard in it, the bag tears. Yogurt containers, boxes, cartons, everything. Everything rips these bags. I would throw the entire box of them away, but it would rip the bag.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bags!  Great Value!  Timely Delivery!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to do something tangible for a family whose mother died. The family is very large and we want to be able to do something memorable to show our love. With people bringing pans, pots, and trays of food, we knew that there would be a tremendous need for paper products. The Solimo trash bags exceeded our expectations for a trash bag. We wanted something affordable yet durable. ( There is nothing worse than taking out the trash in a busted trash bag!) These bags were perfect. We will be buying them for our own personal use. I HIGHLY recommend these trash bags.
customer_reviews.author: Sherita L. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: They’re okay. Good price but I switched from glad stretch and scented. So it’s a HUGE step down. Bags fit well in my can, I haven’t had any leaking or ripping issues. But I prefer the stretch and scented for my house hold use. I do use these in a rental we own. And I think they’re a great value there. Since trash bags are constantly getting thrown out, overstuffing doesn’t usually happen
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Used to be good now handles rip
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these bags several times, they have been a great value and worked well. With my most recent box there is either a change in manufacturing or a defect. Every time I pull the handles to close the bag the handle rips out of the bag making it impossible to close with the drawstring. At first I thought I was overloading the bag but this happens no matter how full/heavy the bag is. It's a trash bag, it's whole job is to hold trash and it's currently failing. I hope this was just a fluke, it has been really convenient getting these in my subscriptions.
customer_reviews.author: tz

customer_reviews.title: Truly unscented
customer_reviews.text: I have a chemical and odor sensitivity with pretty much all kitchen trash bags and have been in search of a truly unscented bag - these do not disappoint. Other garbage bag companies - when you label a product "Unscented" that is also labeled "with odor shield" or "odor guard"...said odor shield/guard is indeed a scent! And a smelly one at that. These hold up well, typical drawstring ties, and best of all....nooooo scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No plastic smell!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using forceflex unscented for years and it made me sick. I decided to buy these after a reviewer said there was no smell. They were right - NO smell whatsoever. I was pleased to see how strong these are and they fit perfectly without sagging or falling into the can. I highly recommend these to anyone with a chemical sensitivity!
customer_reviews.author: Prof. Shelby

customer_reviews.title: It's safe to take the garbage out now
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in my home agrees that these are better than any name brand and we've tried them all. My household likes to play this game where we all pile trash in the can and pretend that we don't see that it's full. I've heard it's a pretty popular game in all homes. The fun part is when someone finally gives in and decides to take the trash out and then the bag breaks because it has all of Sarah Cynthia Sylvia Stout's room in it. This bag has ruined the fun of that game.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Glad alternative.
customer_reviews.text: These are so of the best trash bags I’ve ever bought. The price point t is great and the durability is too. I tend to throw a log of heavy items away like glass jars from pasta sauce or empty candle containers and this does the job.it also contains odors well. I haven’t had any tips or tears so far. The company also stand behind their product offering a satisfaction guarantee for 1 year. I am just as happy with this as I was with the OVERPRICED Glad trash bags.
customer_reviews.author: Cydney

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, no scent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Glad 8 gallon for my 8 gallon in, they did not fit and were too small and flimsy. I decided to buy these and a size 13 gallon, they fit great, have extra room and are very sturdy! I will definitely buy these again and similar bags from the same company, they are they good! They came in a box and I don’t recall if there is supposed to be a scent or not, but there is no scent which is great for me! They pull off the roll easily and slow the next one to be easily grabbed as well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Honesty is the best policy!!!

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not great for a generic brand
customer_reviews.text: I have been a long time buyer of Kirkland brand garbage bags but in a small apartment, I got annoyed having to store such a large sized box so I decided to try these. Definitely not as good as Kirkland. They have less give, and rip more. The tie is tough and harder to use. I probably won’t be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Molde Homestead.
customer_reviews.text: I got my purchase the other day, It seem to be a okay product! Merchandise I got is a 200 box of garbage bags they should last me for a very long time as of now all, I can say about the product is it just seems like it's going to be okay. Good deal for the price! If you want garbage bags for a while this is a good deal for the price! I guess, I would have to say they are as good as any other garbage bags on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Johney D. Deaton

customer_reviews.title: Complete Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Completely useless. These tear instantly when you try to remove from the rubbish bin. Have to literally dump the trash upside down into another trash bag and use two bags per one bin of rubbish. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: S. R.

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as Glad
customer_reviews.text: Comparing the Glad brand with these, neither I nor my husband could see a difference. I mention both of us in this review because I seem to do the filling up of the bags and he always takes them out and gets them into the trash can and to the curb. They are strong and their seams hold. We decided to save some pennies and forgo the flex feature, as we seem to fill up the plain and the flex with the same amount of garbage no matter what. We also saved some more by forgoing the scented bags--we disliked the flowery fake perfume scent more than we dislike the smell of the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: I Do The Speed LimitTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Most Fantastic Purchase I Have Ever Made, Life Changing!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe how terrible life would become when I ran out of garbage bags, but the day came and I was caught unaware! I turned to the trustiest of suppliers I could find, amazon! I did my research and found the best bags on the market, Amazon Brand - Solimo Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags! When these arrived it was like Christmas morning! My life was changed! I no longer had to live in squalor amidst the heaps of trash accumulated by myself and my roommates. The absolute joy brought to us by these trash bags is unparalleled by anything I've experienced before. I would highly recommend these for your household trash disposal needs!
customer_reviews.author: erptwerp

customer_reviews.title: Drawstrings easily snap off and bags rip easily☹️
customer_reviews.text: First time trying Amazon brand trashbags. I'll keep it short and simple. The drawstrings don't have much strength,they snap off easily and the bags tend to rip through easily. I was putting our recycling into the bag and a cardboard box quickly tore a hole through the middle of the bag. These are clearly not Glad trashbags so don't expect much quality from these trashbags. TIP: Also if you are strung on using these bags I suggest you double layer your trash bin,etc before putting trash or recycle in the bags,that way when you take it out if it tears you will have an extra layer so that your trash or recycle does not spill out.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Fits my garbage bin
customer_reviews.text: I have had problems in the past getting the top of a garbage bag to fit over the top of the garbage bin. Then trying to get it loose to take out was a real effort due to being stretched so tightly. These Solimo trash bags have eliminated both problems (getting it securely over the top of the bin, then removing it again when full). They seem sturdy enough (nothing has pushed through to tear any yet). I would recommend for anyone looking for a good product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Charmee

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: The drawstring is sturdy, have yet to have one pull through. I've bought 3 boxes of these bags and have yet to find a bag that is faulty. They're not easy to puncture and don't split. I'm not in the habit of compressing too much trash into one bag though so your experience may differ. Once the bag is filled I do give the garbage one hard push down so that I can draw the top closed and tie easily. The box is sturdy enough that it opens easily and can stand to get jumbled a bit by the kids. I've never had anything spill on the box so can't comment if it will survive that. Satisfactory for me.
customer_reviews.author: ihatelapels

customer_reviews.title: Fine Substitute
customer_reviews.text: Usually spring for the brand name in a product like this, because don't want leaks or tears. Shelves were light in stock during the pandemic so took a chance on this Amazon brand. Good choice. Well made, durable, leak and tear free so far. As sturdy as the top line, (just a little bit thinner and not noticeable). So, a good value basic substitute.
customer_reviews.author: Pop Bop

customer_reviews.title: Saves money so why not?
customer_reviews.text: I was a pretty consistent user of Glad products. Forceflex this Atomic proof that Etc I was never dissatisfied with them really but since there was a cost-savings decided to give these a try. I expected I would burn through them quite a bit quicker with tears excetera but to my surprise I think they might even be slightly more durable for kitchen use. No fancy patterns on the bags no exaggerated commercials advertisements on the box but for some reason they fit my trash can a little better and I seem to have less tears so I would definitely continue using these The good: 1. price 2. Very durable
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and durability
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with the performance of these bags. I have been using them for a long time now and have them on autoship. As a former Hefty ir Glad brand user, I was leery about trying these. I've tried other brands and store brands before only to be disappointed. Not so here. I am now a loyal user and have no issues on the strength and durability of these bags. They have never ripped, torn, burst, or malfunctioned and we fill ours pretty full and definitely heavy before tossing. Fits my garbage can perfectly and doesn't fall in, ever.
customer_reviews.author: momof3boys

customer_reviews.title: Don’t StaY in place, bags shorter fall into trash can, stick with brand name changed rating 3 to 1.
customer_reviews.text: Are use these in a covered trashcan they don’t stay in place as well as others I have used they seem a little bit lighter and thinner than product I’ve used in the past but in honesty I’ve had no problem other than staying in place they are unscented so why rate sent I don’t know! up date Nov 2 , I have come to not like these bags, they are to short and do not stay in place over top of trade can, changed my rating from 3 to one ! I will stick with name brand!
customer_reviews.author: dan cope

customer_reviews.title: WOW! Good Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't like saving money? These are comparable to the other bags I've bought. Hefty cinch sack... Ingles brand trash bags (they're the exact same), and others... I'm throwing trash into them... Why do I have to impress anyone? If I'm buying expensive garbage bags... I need to get my head examined because I'm literally throwing away money! Anyhow, buy these!!! They work!!! And I've yet to have it rip on regular trash... I've even over-loaded them... Nothing to it! They work, and I've found a new brand...
customer_reviews.author: Silky Seams

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stretch around top of some standard cans
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave these bags three stars is that I was looking for bags with a little larger top. These bags have to be stretched to fit two of my main garbage cans. I’m always worried that the top seams will break. Also it hurts my fingers to stretch the bags so that they will fit over the top of these cans. So far I have found one namebrand that is flexible enough to easily stretch over the tops of all of my garbage cans. I wish these Amazon basics would do that because I like everything else about them.
customer_reviews.author: Dianneb36801

customer_reviews.title: Whoever thought i'd be writing reviews for garbage bags
customer_reviews.text: The year is 2020 and the coronovirus has hit. I've stocked up on toilet paper, mac and cheese and water bottles. After a handful of days of my garbage filling up and being replaced the day had come... I ran out of trash bags. I had bought this 200 count last year when I moved into my apartment and I hadn't thought of trash bags since. Now, during a crisis I had no trash bags. My quantity of orange shoprite bags was depleted and I had no idea what to do. Everything was being used as a make-shift trash bag but nothing as good as these bags. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Doug R.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly pretty good for a generic trash bag
customer_reviews.text: Giving this a 5 star review for the combination of price compared to quality. I've tried similarly priced bags before and they don't come with drawstrings... and those stretchy flaps you're supposed to tie together always stretch a little *too* far, reducing the support the bag gives against the weight of the trash as you're carrying it outside. These bags... don't have that problem! They hold up well and are easy to tie off. Do recommend for everyday kitchen / bathroom use.
customer_reviews.author: J W

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Bag, except they don't stay on the can
customer_reviews.text: The bag is strong and thick and fine for most things but we cannot get it to stay on the trash can. I was buying Glad Flex bags but decided to try these because they were less expensive. I probably s hould not have started out with 200. I hate digging in the trash to find the edges of the bag. They fall in every time. I never had this problem with the Flex, in fact they were so tight they would be hard to get off sometimes. Not sure if I will buy again. The price and quality are great but I am so annoyed by the bag slipping in constantly.
customer_reviews.author: E. Riddell

customer_reviews.title: Quality Has Gone From Good to Bad
customer_reviews.text: When I first started using these Solimo bags, the quality was good. They were almost as good as the name brands and cost less. However the latest box I received has a big problem. The bags rip when you are trying to open them. As you separate the the bag to open it, the plastic rips right under the red drawstring. Sometimes it rips when you open it, sometimes it rips when you are trying to tie it up. For some reason they do not accept returns on this item so I am stuck but I did cancel my subscribe and save order.
customer_reviews.author: HHISC

customer_reviews.title: Never had a tear nor a leak. Super strong!
customer_reviews.text: I’m saving money using these over the grocery store purchases my husband usually makes for trash bags plus it so convenient having them delivered right on my doorstep. I’ve subscribed to these to keep the savings & value coming. Just a note to Solimo - please make sturdier boxes! Every Solimo product I’ve received came in a box that was falling apart & Ive had to use packing tape to hold them together. They arrived that way. That’s the only problem I have with Solimo products - very flimsy boxes which don’t even survive shipping quite often. Other than that, these are good strong trash bags. I’ve never had one tear nor leak. Great product. I hope this is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: McSusie

customer_reviews.title: Good price for so many bags
customer_reviews.text: I use these bags to line the trash and recycle cans. The recycle can sit there a bit longer, and haven't had any odor problems (though items are usually rinsed / not trash and don't necessarily smell). I have not had any ripping issues, and the drawstrings have not broken once. I have been using these for six months currently. They don't do anything for odor control if the trash does not pile up for takeout fast enough. I want to try out the new Solimo bags that have scents now, but I have to run out of these first, lol. 200 lasts a long time in my household.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Glad who? Hefty? Never heard of them...
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I am VERY satisfied with these garbage bags. These are just as good if not better as the name brand trash bags. I purchased these to be delivered since I needed them ASAP and was too lazy to go to the store. I have to say I was surprised at the quality of hothead bags. I don’t think I’ll ever go back to name brand trash bags. For the most part every Solimo brand I’ve purchased has had a great price point and excellent quality. I will definitely be purchasing these again.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Don’t waste your money on anything else!
customer_reviews.text: These perform as well as any other name brand. Quality, strength, and durability for less! I have been buying these for a few years now with no complains!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick L

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Every single one that I take out rips. I know that sounds so snobbish and first would problem but it's annoying. I end up having to double bag the bag with another so I have to waste more. I do NOT reccomend these at all. They stay in the can fine but soon as you attempt to pull them out POOF the red string comes off !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than store brands
customer_reviews.text: These have been frustration-free trash bags - no leaks/tears and a perfect fit for my trash can. Seems like the various store brands I had been buying kept getting incrementally smaller and had to be stretched a bit to fit. These are just right. I like the drawstring so much better than the handle ties, too.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu the Lefty

customer_reviews.title: A decent bargain
customer_reviews.text: I would give these an overall rating of 3. They fit my tall kitchen garbage can just right. They hold up fairly well in the can. However when I take the garbage bag out is when the problems start to occur. When I pull the draw strings out to tie them together usually one will rip right out of the bag. I am not pulling hard on the draw strings. I couldn't even if I wanted to. The other problem is that the odor control doesn't last very long. Having said all that I still think it's a decent bargain. You're getting a lot of bags for a low price.
customer_reviews.author: jackie r.

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!!! I will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I really needed kitchen trash bags and there was no way I was attempting a Costco run for my usual trash bags. So I decided to try the Amazon brand. They had them in stock and despite all the crazy buying right now they arrived quickly. They are great bags! I really like the feel of them and they fit perfectly. The price was also great!
customer_reviews.author: D. Aguinaldo

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Terrible
customer_reviews.text: First off all the bags I received were defective. The string that is used to tie the bag was broken, so I had to manually tie it. The strength of the bag was a joke. If you put anything even remotely heavy, (Like an empty wine bottle) it tears. I will be trying to return these, and have gone back to hefty for my trash bags, at least they have better quality control. These bags are not worth the few dollars I saved. I will not be ordering these again.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Steude

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen trash bags
customer_reviews.text: These are now the only kitchen trash bags I will buy. They are very sturdy. I've used them for a few months now and have had absolutely no issues. They are not scented - which is what I want. Scented trash bags never maintain their scent anyway. I've used these for several other uses (dirty clothes when traveling, storing winter comforters, etc...) and have absolutely no complaints. The value (price vs product) is outstanding. The number of bags you get and the quality of the bags is amazing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent trash bags.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a few weeks ago when I realized our stock of generic grocery store bags was running low. I just got to bust out these bad boys today, and what a thrill it was! Four rolls of high quality trash bags, neatly arranged in a stylish blue box. The drawstring quality rivals the generic grocery store brands any day of the week. As exciting as it was to place the bag in the can, I can't wait for the opportunity to take it out and carry it to the street!
customer_reviews.author: Robert G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, there are sturdier and thicker kitchen trash bags than these but for the cost, these are an excellent value. I’ve had maybe a couple of minor tears when removing it from the trash bin but its always when I over pack the bin with garbage making it difficult to pull it out. A handful of minor tears for 120 bags is a ratio I am ok with especially for the price. I don’t need contractor bag thickness for my kitchen garbage so I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: K Fernandez

customer_reviews.text: 1.111, item paid with credit card, credit card paid in full, 2.111 use of item stalked with persons staring at phones, calculating use of benefits?, 3.111, i. Private employment pursued, and Private housing change researched politely for 3 years, yet unsuccessful. ii.ix. Crowds of masked persons, noises and sensations near hallway cleaning closet and stairs to cleaning storage, outside of apt 301?, iii. hendered cleaining, organizing, restroom use, resting, and typing, ? until crowds of...halve a CEO resume?.
customer_reviews.author: James Edward Curtis Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great Trash Bags
customer_reviews.text: There have been reports that these bags have an odor, but I can not smell anything from these bags. There may be a slight odor when the box is first opened but, believe it or not, that's from the cardboard and very common, that smell will dissipate in a days IF it is even noticeable. Now the bags themselves are by far the best garbage bags I have ever used. They fit my Trash can perfectly, have a thinker mil-ply that most and have yet to fail upon removal. I can not say that about Glad bags and that's what I used to buy.... AT twice the price !
customer_reviews.author: F. Rotello

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, 3 star durability & flex
customer_reviews.text: These are hot hefty grade bags, but for the price they are good. My tip is don’t treat them like hefty bags. Meaning don’t overstuff or attempt to fill the bag more than you would a shopping bag. Also I double bag messy things in shopping bags before putting them in. Something like leftover pasta with sauce goes into a plastic shopping bag before Being put in the trash. That helps avoid a mess incase of an accident. For the price these are good based on their 3 star durability. Just don’t overstuff them.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t too bad, but it seems like I went through them awfully fast. Like I sometimes had to double up on the bags in order to make them hold. And to be honest, they didn’t really seem to be that great of a value over, say, the grocery store or big box brand. I suppose you get the convenience of having them shipped to your door, but if I’m actually going to the store already, my grocery store brand is thicker AND cheaper. And they work better. That makes me want to get these less in that case, so the last two times I’ve gotten bags I’ve just gotten them at my grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Almost great
customer_reviews.text: I went from glad bags to these because of the better price. I don't mind that the bag is not ridged and somewhat see-through. They have a sturdy string and they survive corners like soda can cartons. The only thing that's annoying - the string grip of the trash can. I have a step open bin and although when there's barely anything in it it's not a problem, when it gets 60% full it's problematic. I have to push the trash in as I hold/pull the bag up in order to pull the string area over the lip of the bin.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia H

customer_reviews.title: Box was mangled and ripped. Bags are excellent
customer_reviews.text: I used to make garbage bags for a living on a couple large cmd machines. This bags are great. Really nice film was used to make them. All the seams are perfect. The punch for the pull ties are perfectly centered. Only issue was the condition of the box they come in. It was ripped up missing flaps and not sealed, which makes me question the bag count in the box. Not sure if I actually got "90"? For some reason I can add photos? Anyway came fast only took 2 days and I will order more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymie

customer_reviews.title: NOT super strong or stretchable like Hefty or Glads.
customer_reviews.text: These fit my tall kitchen trash can, had the pull closed tabs, and smelled ok. Did not "stretch" to contain trash of bulky or unusual size as I expected. Though I did not like this non-stretch version, I guess I am spoiled by Heftys Iltra Strong, I kept the HUGE box due to the price. I won't be repeating this mistake in the future anytime soon though.
customer_reviews.author: Kekaha Caregiver

customer_reviews.title: bags that don’t burst or leak
customer_reviews.text: If I want to, I can walk 1/8 mile to my apartment dumpster with these bags full and they have yet to burst. I have taken an evening walk with a full bag with no spills or ties breaking. Strong bags to put my leaf and branch cuttings into as well. what really impressed me is when I poured cooled cooking oil into Solimo garbage bag and it did not leak into my wastebasket. I have never actually seen a leak from other liquids as well.
customer_reviews.author: Valena

customer_reviews.title: Very happy so far
customer_reviews.text: So we used to use older grocery bags for our garbage but my state banned single use plastic bags so we finally got the trashcan and bags. So far these are great, hold a lot and close up well. If you need to buy bulk garbage bags these should work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jaytrade

customer_reviews.title: Most value for money trash bags
customer_reviews.text: I love Amazon Brand products especially these trash bags. They are strong and sturdy, they drawstrings don’t break even if you over fill. It is priced lower than the competition, i love the hefty brand bags but they are more expensive and these Amazon one’s perform the same if not better.
customer_reviews.author: Vrushank

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box today and was pleasantly surprised. Well-sized, and it seems very sturdy. I cannot attest as to durability because I just lined my trash can with it a couple of minutes back, but I don't see any issues with it, is really looks of very good quality and strong, with more than average thickness of the plastic. Plus, all the bags in the roll are already separated, you don't have to look for where you should separate the bags. I will certainly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nelida Kreer

customer_reviews.title: Great impression at first
customer_reviews.text: I was so glad to get these trash bags. The price is great! I started using them as soon as I got them and was very happy with the quality... until 5 days ago. Unfortunately, the last 3 bags I used had a tear on the seam where the pull strings are. I don't know if it's just a bad batch of the ones that the machine 'burnt' on the seam a little extra... The roll was fine until these last bags. I'll keep updating as I go through the roll.
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina

customer_reviews.title: These fit my kitchen trash can
customer_reviews.text: The national brands of bags I've been using are so tight I was having a very difficult time placing them on my can. I looked on Amazon and read the reviews. Some of them claimed these bags seemed to have an extra inch or so. I ordered them hoping this would be true. It was!!! They are just perfect for my trash can. They seem to be just as good in quality and strength. I'm glad I got them. I'm REALLY glad every time I have to put a new bag in the can!
customer_reviews.author: Joyful One

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: My garbage can is electric, (purchased on Amazon,) and does not require bags to be stretched across the rim. This 13 gallon size fits perfectly and loosely and is thick enough for my needs as I do not overfill my bags. These bags are identical to bags I have been buying at a large warehouse store, however, I discovered that per bag I am paying half the price for the Amazon bags making me a happy camper who will re-order when the time comes. BTW, these bags are great for storage also.
customer_reviews.author: Elke's Shopping Mall

customer_reviews.title: Lots of trash goes in- they hold up well
customer_reviews.text: We like having these come in our subscribe and save. They aren’t as durable as the Hefty brand but for the money and convenience I like them enough. Mine are not scented
customer_reviews.author: Misty Hanke

customer_reviews.title: They're better than supermarket generics
customer_reviews.text: What do you need out of a trash bag? I guess it depends on who's asking. Garbage bags are used to dispose of things, from old clothes to bodies to kitchen waste. These bags are relatively elastic but also tear quite easily. They are much sturdier than what you might find as a generic in you local Stop & Shop or Shaw's, but they also don't have the durability of some of the brand name trash bags. As far as what you pay for these versus their quality and quantity, you're getting on heck of a bargain
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to Force Flex!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit concerned by some of the other reviews in regards to this bags sturdiness, in comparison to force flex. I must say I have been pleasantly surprised and I can stuff a ton of trash in this bag and the strings don’t break and the bag doesn’t rip. I’m not sure why so many have had issues with these bags but I say 5 star all the way. Less expensive and just as effective as the higher priced alternative. Trust me you’ll love it and I order through subscribe and save so I get them delivered right to my door step. *HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Chicken Keeper

customer_reviews.title: Good Material
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy my trash bags from Costco or Sam's Club, but for whatever reason I forgot this time, so I decided to buy them online so that I wouldn't have to run to the store. Anyway, I have been pleasantly surprised by the quality of these bags. I hate when the plastic stretches or when the red drawstring comes out, and that doesn't happen with these. They don't have a scent, but I like that. Overall, I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Diego & Roxanna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I had been using more expensive dark green bags for trash until I discovered these. While they do feel a bit lighter than the others, I have not yet had a single problem with them. Not one has ripped with trash in it. I priced these against some other brands in the dollar store, and these actually turned out to be a little cheaper due to the volume. With once a week trash pickup, these 90 bags will last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Dee

customer_reviews.title: Holds 40 lbs of diapers, not bad
customer_reviews.text: We have three children in disposable diapers so Trash bags are one of the things we have to buy in bulk. Let me tell you these things usually hold up a 40 pounds in diapers I’ve never once torn on me while carrying it to the dumpster. I think that speaks volumes!
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Use for food shopping 1st then your garbage bags 2nd
customer_reviews.text: If you take the new garbage bags to the grocery store and use them 1st for your food then for your garbage when you get your food home safe and saving you money "plus saving the planet a little bit , by not using smaller 1 time use store bags, If everyone takes there new plastic garbage bags to the store n use them 1 time to put groceries in then use as the garbage bag. Most all people buy plastic garbage bags anyway ya know, maybe spread the word and we all can make a difference together. 🙏
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very good value
customer_reviews.text: They were not the size that I needed at what time. I would have returning them but Amazon credit at my account and not to worry about sending them back. I have used them on several occasions and they work very well as light weight garbage bags. I also use them when cleaning out my closet and they hold quite a few things I like the drawstring time as well and it was a very good value. I also like that they are not stuck together a roll off one at a time.
customer_reviews.author: SissyD

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: These are durable and the price point is good for them. The red ties are thick and hold up well also. Only thing is the bags do seem to be a bit shorter than the ones I am used to, and tend to want to fall down in side the garbage can if I don't take care to but the bag on securely . Which was not an issue with my old brand name ones that seemed to be a bit larger but more costly too. (other wise, I would be giving these a 5 star rating )
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I typically purchase the Member Mark brand from Sams, but was unable to get any lately. I tried these and am rather disappointed. The bags easily come loose from the rim of the trash can and have to be fixed repeatedly. I used to think the odor control/scent feature on my previous bags was a gimmick, but after using these for two weeks, I realize that wasn't the case. My trash reeks with these bags. Now that my normal brand is available, I'm going back and taking the loss.
customer_reviews.author: Herrington

customer_reviews.title: Good trash bags
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what there is to say about trash bags. The Solimo tall kitchen trash bags work for me. They seem a bit smaller than other trash bags I've tried, but the volume appears to be in line with those others. The bags are strong enough for what I usually throw out in the kitchen. Again, these are trash bags and for me, they work just as well as others I've tried. I do think they are a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. K

customer_reviews.title: Similar to Kirkland, but smaller rolls which separate easier
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it had a great guarantee (full refund without returning the item if you don't like it). It is very similar to the Costco trash bags (size, fit, smell, etc.) but with two features different from the Kirkland brand The first is that the number of bags on a roll is fewer which I like because I put an entire roll in the trash can and remove one bag each time I take out the trash. The second is that the bags separate even easier than the Costco rolls, they just simply fall loose.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Beall

customer_reviews.title: The drawstrings keep breaking
customer_reviews.text: Normally love Amazon brands, and the white plastic portion is quite sturdy, but the drawstrings occasionally snap with very little force (i.e. there's no way to stop it while still using them). I estimate that about 1 out of every 8 snap. I'm able to "make it work" on about half of those, the remainder need a second garbage bag to be applied. A fine value, but didn't expect a quality issue on a product type that's been around and I've been using for so long.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Garbage bags that work!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as a change-up from my normal name brand garbage bags. I hate when garbage bags fall apart or rip on you, so I usually pay more for them! Yuck when garbage oozes into the can or across your kitchen floor! These have been great thus far. They are not scented, which is fine by me. They pull from my garbage can well and have not ripped. Their ties are strong also. I recommend trying them out!
customer_reviews.author: SixInTheSun

customer_reviews.title: These are not bad, but they are not Glad
customer_reviews.text: We have used Glad forever and I have to say these are not too bad, but they are no Glad bags for sure. I have had these rip when bringing them out of the can but have not really had a total mess to clean up yet. The price point is what made me try these, but I have to carry the bags quite a way to get to the outside can, and I worry about doing so with these bags. I will use them all up but I may go back to name brand bags after.
customer_reviews.author: PETRA

customer_reviews.title: My #1 trash bag
customer_reviews.text: I will use these trash bags for as long as they make them and sell them to me. They are the best I have ever purchased by far. They don’t have a scent (which I prefer anyway). They don’t tear, rip, or leak easily. I have never had a problem with them. I’m sure something sharp would tear them but I use them for the kitchen and have no dislikes at all
customer_reviews.author: JenJud

customer_reviews.title: Strong bags
customer_reviews.text: Bags are as strong as the name brand bags we usually buy. I wanted to try them out, and I stuffed one extra full before taking it out to see how it would hold up. Cardboard and paper on top of kitchen trash, bag would not close all the way and was heavier than usual. I banged it around after I got outside and it did not break, and after using them for a few weeks, I like the quality. I mean, all it has to do is hold the trash, and I have had some before that would split open if you look at it too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Watson III

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance and ordered these and was very pleasantly surprised. I have now purchased them twice with great performance both times. I've found them to be every bit as good as the brand name trash bags. Very sturdy- not one leak or rip. And I have two teenage boys that aren't exactly gentle when they take out the trash! The draw strings function well. Mine are unscented (not sure if scent is an option?). Will definitely continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cici

customer_reviews.title: Awful bags, don’t go the cheap way.
customer_reviews.text: Awful trash bags. The only positive is the price. You do get a bunch of bags for a cheap price, but you definitely get what you pay for. The bags will NOT stay over the top of the trashcan. Even the smallest piece of normal garbage causes the bag to slide down in the trashcan, so be prepared to constantly pull the bag back up. Once you’ve finally had enough and decide to pull the bag out, you’ll find they don’t hold much garbage without ripping. We’ve definitely switched back to Glad bags.
customer_reviews.author: MelissaJane718

customer_reviews.title: Strong and unscented
customer_reviews.text: Super heavy duty - I was pleasantly surprised that these do not flex, but are much more durable than the hefty or glad bags(in my opinion at least) I also really appreciate the fact that they are unscented. Fake scents often give me headaches, and it has become increasingly difficult to find hefty or glad bags that are not scented. I was afraid these wouldnt be durable enough to make the switch- but they are! So they are perfect for our house. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Delaney

customer_reviews.title: NOT what I had expected!
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed.... I have had tremendous success with other Amazon household products, but these trash bags have NO "give" to them and tear very easily. The handle ties ripped through the top of the bags and I have had to use more rhan one bag to hold what used to fit in one! I thought the price was exceptional but now using 2 for each 1, the value is gone....very disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Okay Trash Bags
customer_reviews.text: If I had to order trash bags again, I wouldn't buy these. The bags themselves are okay but they will not stay in our trashcan (standard 13-gallon kitchen trashcan from Rubbermaid). The bags slip after 1 or 2 items have been thrown out and it is a constant fight to keep it in place. I've tried everything I can think of to get these trash bags to stay in place short of duct tape. As for the scent, they don't smell like anything (Pretty happy about them not having a smell). Overall, they were inexpensive, shipped quickly and I didn't have to run to the store for a single item.
customer_reviews.author: Bholmes7

customer_reviews.title: Plentiful but cheap
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to see if for the value these were the equivalent of a 'good' competitor bag. They aren't. They rip rather easily and shouldn't be used for even a medium sized kitchen trash full of mixed items. Time and again a small tear would form and then widen and that's about the last thing you want in a garbage bag. This is an area I don't skimp in, but I wanted to experiment as the value per quantity seemed great. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Amazon Brand - Solimo Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, 13 Gallon, 120 Count
product_meta.description: Size:120 Count (Pack of 1)| Style:KitchenAmazon Brand - Solimo Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, Unscented, 13 Gallon, 120 Count
feature_bullets: Includes 120 tall kitchen garbage bags. Bag dimensions equal 24 inches wide by 27 3/8 inches tall, bag thickness equals .9 mil
Each trash bag has a 13 gallon capacity
White trash bag with red drawstring closure for easy tying and carrying
Satisfaction Guarantee: We’re proud of our products. If you aren’t satisfied, we’ll refund you for any reason within a year of purchase. 1-877-485-0385
